subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: A year after Scott became the first Australian to win the Masters with a sudden-death victory over Ángel Cabrera, he is back at Augusta National Golf Club with six countrymen in tow.
snippet: A year after Scott became the first Australian to win the Masters with a sudden-death victory over Ángel Cabrera, he is back at Augusta National Golf Club with six countrymen in tow.
